Config.Name: Proxy Port
Config.Description: Port used to access the Plex proxy

Config.Name: Plex Token
Config.Description: Plex Token need for hero images

Config.Name: Interleave?
Config.Description: Interleave home hubs. Collection hubs with the same name from different libraries are interleaved (combined) into one.

Config.Name: Exclude watched?
Config.Description: If set to true, hide watched items for hubs.

Config.Name: Hub restrictions
Config.Description: Apply collections restrictions to their hub's. Plex does not apply restrictions to hubs, so you cannot have different collection hubs for users. this fixes that.

Config.Name: Disable user state?
Config.Description: Remove watched badges from hub items. Doesn't work on all clients.

Config.Name: Disable leaf count?
Config.Description: Remove episode count label from show artwork.

Config.Name: Hero rows
Config.Description: Comma seperated list of hub-identifiers to make built-in hubs hero style, see GitHub for the options.

Config.Name: Force maximum quality?
Config.Description: This will force clients to use the maximum quality, see GitHub for more info.

Config.Name: Force direct play for
Config.Description: Force direct play for the given resolutions, see GitHub for more info.

Config.Name: Video transcode fallback for
Config.Description: If the selected media triggers a video transcode fallback to another version of the media, see GitHub for more info.

Config.Name: Auto select version?
Config.Description: If you have multiple versions of a media item then this setting will choose the one thats closest to the client resolution.

Config.Name: Cache TTL
Config.Description: Time to live for general caches in seconds.
